noindex.text: Set 'no-index' meta-tag on this page (if no-index is set on the site - this page will already have no-index set)
noindex.name: ./noindex

usethirdpartycookie.name: ./usethirdpartycookie
usethirdpartycookie.text: 'Use 'OneTrust' Cookies (leave unchecked to use custom cookie implementation)

siteregion.fieldLabel: Site Region (i.e. the English region name)
siteregion.name: ./siteregion

sitelanguage.fieldLabel: Site Language (i.e. the Language code to appear in the menu)
sitelanguage.name: ./sitelanguage

acceptlanguages.fieldLabel: Accepts Language (i.e. comma separate the ISO language code(s) targetted by this site)
acceptlanguages.name: ./acceptlanguages

shipnowmarketo.name: ./shipnowmarketo
shipnowmarketo.text: 'Ship Now'/'Open account' forms submit to Marketo

marketoformid.name: ./marketoFormId
marketoformid.emptyText: Marketo form ID of the 'hidden' form, such as 1795
marketoformid.fieldDescription: Form (asset) ID of the form in Marketo

marketomunchkinid.name: ./marketoMunchkinId
marketomunchkinid.emptyText: Marketo project ID of the 'hidden' form, such as 903-EZK-832

hiddenmarketoformid.name: ./hiddenMarketoId
hiddenmarketoformid.emptyText: Marketo form ID of the 'hidden' form, such as 1799
hiddenmarketoformid.fieldDescription: Form (asset) ID of the form in Marketo. Refers to 'hidden' form.

hiddenmarketomunchkinid.name: ./hiddenMarketoMunchkinId
hiddenmarketomunchkinid.emptyText: Marketo project ID of the 'hidden' form, such as 903-EZK-832
hiddenmarketomunchkinid.fieldDescription: Marketo project (munchkin ID). Refers to 'hidden' form.

marketoHostname.name: ./marketoHostname
marketoHostname.fieldDescription: Marketo hostname. Controls where the form submissions are sent.

title.fieldLabel: Title (will be used if the component does not have a custom title configuration)
title.fieldDescription: This field allows you to define a default title for related posts. This default title will be used when the component doesn't have a custom title configured. If you don't set a default title and there's no custom title configuration, no title will be displayed for the related posts.
title.name: ./relatedPost/title
